title: What are the instructions for generating mental energy through visualization and movement?
first_phrase: This section of text discusses the creation and animation of a fluid current within oneself and amongst a group, as well as the visualization of geometric figures for spiritual connection. It follows instructions on mental line-tracing and the formation of a pentagram. The text ends with instructions for a further phase: to resist the current and absorb its energy, or to focus circulation in the forehead. The text features concepts such as line-tracing, geometric figures, and energy absorbance, and mentions the creation of a fluid current among participants.

last_phrase: In conclusion, these instructions offer a powerful way to awaken and harness our inner energy through visualization, movement, and concentration. By gradually accelerating and then resisting the flow of energy, and by focusing on the key energy centers of the body, we can cultivate a deep sense of vitality and openness that can carry over into all aspects of our lives. Give it a try and experience the liberating power of this ancient practice.
